name: Incredible Dracula: Chasing Love
summary: Vampires have gotten a bad rap. Take Count Dracula for instance. People think all he wants to do is suck their blood, but in truth, he wants the same things everyone else does: food, shelter, and love. He won't settle for just any woman, though, so when a man-hungry princess takes a liking to him against his wishes, he does the only thing a red-blooded (or an undead) male can do: run!
